name: Fantasy Quest Solitaire
description: At the very last moment the Fairy Land was saved from the dark shadows. But now absolute chaos is threatening its peaceful denizens. King Feodor asks the magic Fairies for help. Are you ready to face this challenge? Play your cards right and solve many challenging quests.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
